headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and metric values. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, labels, inputs, and table data.

mono.usage: Use for API keys, transaction IDs, and code snippets.

glassmorphism.default: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
glassmorphism.heavy: backdrop-filter: blur(24px); background: rgba(2, 6, 23, 0.8); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);

buttons.primary: bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-600 text-white font-bold shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,197,94,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98]

cards.dashboard: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-lg p-6 hover:border-green-500/30 transition-colors
cards.stat: relative overflow-hidden bg-slate-900 border border-white/5 rounded-lg p-6 group hover:bg-slate-800/50 transition-all

inputs.default: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-green-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-green-500/50 placeholder:text-slate-600 text-white rounded-md h-10 px-3

dashboard.rules: Dense layout. Use col-span-2 for main charts. Use col-span-1 for metric cards. Ensure full height alignment.

marketing.rules: Asymmetrical. Hero takes 8 cols. Features take 4 cols. Use negative space.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-50 or Slate-200 on dark backgrounds. Avoid Slate-500 for body text.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings using ring-2 ring-green-500/50 offset-2 offset-slate-950

3d_libraries.usage: Use Recharts for financial data. Use Framer Motion for layout transitions. Avoid heavy 3D libraries for this dashboard to maintain speed.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Cyber-Fintech' aesthetic: Dark mode by default, Neon Green accents.
Use 'Chivo' for all headings to give a tech feel. Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for UI text.
Dashboard Layout: Use a dense 'Control Room' grid. No wasted space.
Glassmorphism: Use subtle borders (white/10) and backdrop blur for cards.
Charts: Style Recharts to match the theme (dark tooltips, green lines, grid lines opacity 0.1).
Login Page: Split screen. Left side form, Right side abstract neon image.
Referral System: Highlight the 'R$1000' goal with a progress bar component.
Do not use gradients for text, only for subtle backgrounds or borders.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (brightness-110 or border color change).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
